workflow-form.task: Cadastro de Cooperados - Selecionar Tipo de Cooperado

select.label: Sector Institucional:
select.name: sectorInstitucional
select.optionsQuery: select $sector_id, $sector_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='sectorInstitucional' order by $sector_name

select.label: Província
select.name: provincia
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Província de Registo
select.name: provinciaRegistro
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Banco de Domiciliação
select.name: bancoDomiciliacao
select.optionsQuery: select $bank_id, $bank_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='bank' order by $bank_name

text.name: erro
text.label: Já existe cooperado com o mesmo numero de documento ou nif

workflow-form.task: Cadastro de Cooperados - Carregar Documentos da Empresa

select.label: País/Nacionalidade:
select.name: nacionalidadeFirstOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $country_id, $country_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='country' order by $country_name

select.label: Estado Civil
select.name: estadoCivilFirstOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $status_id, $status_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='maritalStatus' order by $status_name

select.label: *Local de Emissão:
select.name: localEmissaoFirstOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Provínçia:
select.name: provinciaFirstOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Província
select.name: provinciaMorada
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Banco de Domiciliação
select.name: bancoDomiciliacaoFirstOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $bank_id, $bank_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='bank' order by $bank_name

select.label: País/Nacionalidade:
select.name: nacionalidadeSecondOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $country_id, $country_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='country' order by $country_name

select.label: Estado Civil
select.name: estadoCivilSecondOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $status_id, $status_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='maritalStatus' order by $status_name

select.label: Local de Emissão:
select.name: localEmissaoSecondOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Provínçia:
select.name: provinciaSecondOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Banco de Domiciliação
select.name: bancoDomiciliacaoSecondOutorgante
select.optionsQuery: select $bank_id, $bank_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='bank' order by $bank_name

workflow-form.task: Cadastro de Cooperados - Identificação do Procurador

select.label: País/Nacionalidade:
select.name: nacionalidadeProcurador
select.optionsQuery: select $country_id, $country_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='country' order by $country_name

select.label: Estado Civil:
select.name: estadoCivilProcurador
select.optionsQuery: select $status_id, $status_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='maritalStatus' order by $status_name

select.label: Local de Emissão:
select.name: localEmissaoProcurador
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Provínçia:
select.name: provinciaProcurador
select.optionsQuery: select $province_id, $province_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='province' order by $province_name

select.label: Banco de Domiciliação
select.name: bancoProcurador
select.optionsQuery: select $bank_id, $bank_name from DatabaseMetadataValue dmv where dmv.table='bank' order by $bank_name
